author: hahnjo
body:
#### PR description:

Remove EMMT and EMH physics lists. They were interesting for testing, but the maximum gain will come from integrating G4HepEm via the G4VTrackingManager interface as implemented by commit 7a82cb8d6f (and soon to be updated).

#### PR validation:

None, physics lists only used for testing.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Not needed.

FYI @mnovak42
title: Remove EMMT physics list, make EMH an alias for EMM + G4HepEm
